backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing movie storage, user profiles, and access‑controlled CRUD operations using blob storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Listing of summarized descriptions for multiple frontend files covering components, hooks, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global CSS defining theme variables, dark‑mode overrides, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the main React application root and script.
frontend/QA-delete-button-ownership.md: Manual QA checklist verifying delete‑button visibility behavior based on authentication and movie ownership.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React app wiring theme provider, VHS effects, header, movie grid, footer, background music, and add‑movie dialog.
frontend/src/components/AddMovieDialog.t: Add‑movie dialog enforcing authentication, handling file uploads, genre input, and surfacing normalized errors.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication UI managing login/logout via Internet Identity and clearing React Query cache on logout.
Auto-plays a looping synthwave track with mute/unmute controls and fallbacks for autoplay restrictions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a retro-styled footer with branding, a heart icon, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the site header, genre selector, and add-movie button with authentication and genre-loading logic.
frontend/src/components/MovieCard.tsx: Shows a movie card with photo cycling, details preview, and delete support with owner checks.
frontend/src/components/MovieDetailDialo: Provides a dialog showing movie details with swipe/keyboard navigation across photos.
frontend/src/components/MovieGrid.tsx: Loads and displays paginated or filtered movie grids with loading, error, empty states, and detail dialog support.
frontend/src/components/VHSEffects.tsx: Renders animated VHS-style scanlines and glitches using a canvas plus layered retro backgrounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient creation, login state, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, filtering, adding, and deleting movies using the actor returned by useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a neon 1980s theme with custom CSS variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query's QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages with specific handling for authorization and canister issues.
frontend/src/utils/movieOwnership.ts: Provides a helper to determine whether the current user is the creator of a movie.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color variables, container settings, animations, and extended theming utilities. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks current project state, known issues, and feature requests for the VHS movie collection app, including a stopped backend canister and planned fixes. Provides metadata for troubleshooting and deployment planning.
